mapper.insert: insert into authorities (id, authority, enable, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, authority, enable, remark from authorities

SELECT a.id, a.authority, a.`enable` FROM users AS u LEFT JOIN users_roles AS ur ON u.username=ur.users_username LEFT JOIN roles AS r ON r.id = ur.roles_id LEFT JOIN roles_authorities AS ra ON ra.roles_id=r.id LEFT JOIN authorities AS a ON ra.authorities_id = a.id WHERE u.enable=true AND r.enable=true AND a.enable=true AND ur.users_username = #{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
